mapper.update: insert into userinterface(ui_mem_number, ui_user1, ui_user2, ui_user3, ui_autouse) values(#{ui_mem_number}, #{ui_user1}, #{ui_user2}, #{ui_user3}, #{ui_autouse})
mapper.select: select count(*) from userinterface where ui_mem_number = #{mem_number}
select * from board where board_code_number = 'code11' order by 1 desc
select * from board where board_code_number = 'code7' order by 1 desc

select to_number(substr(mem_dept_number,5)) dept_number, (select d.dept_name from department d where m.mem_dept_number = d.dept_number) mem_dept_name, mem_name, (select p.position_name from position p where m.mem_position_number = p.position_number) mem_position_name, mem_email, mem_tel, mem_addr1 from member m order by 1

select to_number(substr(mem_dept_number,5)) dept_number, mem_birthday, (select d.dept_name from department d where m.mem_dept_number = d.dept_number) mem_dept_name, mem_name, (select p.position_name from position p where m.mem_position_number = p.position_number) mem_position_name, mem_email, mem_tel from member m where substr(mem_birthday,4,2) = SUBSTR(sysdate,4,2) order by 1

select * from Duty_document dd where (select m.mem_dept_number from member m where m.mem_number = dd.dd_mem_number) = (select mm.mem_dept_number from member mm where mm.mem_id = #{mem_id}) and dd_public ='y' and to_char(dd_date,'yyyy/MM/dd') between (select to_char(add_months(sysdate,-1),'yyyy/mm/dd') from dual) and sysdate order by 1 desc

select * from duty_document where 1 = 1 and to_char(dd_date,'YYYY/MM/DD') BETWEEN (select to_char(add_months(sysdate,-1),'yyyy/mm/dd') from dual) and SYSDATE and dd_mem_number = #{mem_number} order by 1 desc
select dv_code_name, dv_doc_date, dv_doc_name, dv_doc_number, dv_mem_name from documentview order by dv_doc_number desc

select dr_number, DR_CODE_NUMBER, DR_CONTENT, DR_DATE, DR_MEM_NUMBER, DR_TITLE, DR_TO_MEM_NUMBER, DR_WRITEDATE, DR_YESNO from duty_report where to_char(dr_writedate,'yyyy/MM/dd') between (select to_char(add_months(sysdate,-1),'yyyy/mm/dd') from dual) and sysdate and dr_to_mem_number = (select mem_number from member where mem_id = #{user}) order by 1 desc
select count(*) from Electronic_approval where ea_mem_number = #{mem_number}
